alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:16PM EDT until September 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cortland County in central New York... Northwestern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 516 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marathon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Solon, Cincinnatus, Preston, Willet, Marathon, Pitcher, Pharsalia, Taylor, Lincklaen, and German. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
